LanguageData.GR_GenoframeAwfulRecipe.label: Create Genoframe (Awful)
LanguageData.GR_GenoframeAwfulRecipe.description: Create an awful quality genoframe from an animal corpse.
LanguageData.GR_GenoframePoorRecipe.label: Create Genoframe (Poor)
LanguageData.GR_GenoframePoorRecipe.description: Create a poor quality genoframe from two awful quality genoframes.
LanguageData.GR_GenoframeNormalRecipe.label: Create Genoframe (Normal)
LanguageData.GR_GenoframeNormalRecipe.description: Create a normal quality genoframe from two poor quality genoframes.
LanguageData.GR_GenoframeGoodRecipe.label: Create Genoframe (Good)
LanguageData.GR_GenoframeGoodRecipe.description: Create a good quality genoframe from two normal quality genoframes.
LanguageData.GR_GenoframeExcellentRecipe.label: Create Genoframe (Excellent)
LanguageData.GR_GenoframeExcellentRecipe.description: Create an excellent quality genoframe from two good quality genoframes.
LanguageData.GR_GenoframeMasterworkRecipe.label: Create Genoframe (Masterwork)
LanguageData.GR_GenoframeMasterworkRecipe.description: Create a masterwork quality genoframe from two excellent quality genoframes.
LanguageData.GR_GenoframeLegendaryRecipe.label: Create Genoframe (Legendary)
LanguageData.GR_GenoframeLegendaryRecipe.description: Create a legendary quality genoframe from two masterwork quality genoframes.
